description:
Kon goes out to search for Nozomi and finds her wandering aimlessly. Meanwhile, the Soul Society has assembled a special team, including the Reigai of Ikkaku, Yumichika, and Hisagi, to apprehend Ichigo. The Reigai arrive in the World of the Living where they encounter their originals, and a battle ensues!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Ikkaku vs Ikkaku! Jibun Doushi no Tatakai!
Ikkaku vs. Ikkaku! Showdown of Mutual Self!
Épreuve de force face à soi-même, Ikkaku contre Ikkaku
一角(いっかく)vs一角! 自分同士の戦い!
